Uses of Package
com.thesonofthom.tools

  • Packages that use com.thesonofthom.tools 
    Package Description
    com.thesonofthom.maps  
    com.thesonofthom.tools  
    com.thesonofthom.tools.examples  
  • Classes in com.thesonofthom.tools used by com.thesonofthom.maps 
    Class and Description
    Buffer
    This class is a wrapper around a binary buffer of data (byte array) that allows easy parsing and modification of data within the array
    BufferMap
    This class is a powerful tool that can be used to easily parse a binary buffer of data (byte array) that contains static, known data.
    BufferMap.AbstractField
    This is the base class for all Fields.
    BufferMap.BitField
    This class is for fields that are a single bit long
    BufferMap.BufferField
    This class is for fields that contain a large amount of data that does not need to be parsed By default, the toString() output only prints the number of bytes in the buffer.
    BufferMap.ComplexArrayField
    Class for representing a field that is an array of complex structures
    BufferMap.ComplexField
    This class is for specifying fields that themselves are complex structures that contain other fields
    BufferMap.EnumNumberField
    This class is for defining a field where each value has a specified meaning.
    BufferMap.IntegerEnum
    Interface used by Enums that do not represent a contiguous range of values.
    BufferMap.NullTerminatedStringField
    This class is for fields that are interpreted as ASCII strings that have an unknown length but will terminate in the NULL ('\0') character
    BufferMap.NumberField
    This is used if the field is a simple integer value between 0 and 8 bytes long
    BufferMap.ReservedBitsField
    Class used to mark a series of bits that are reserved.
    BufferMap.ReservedField
    Class used to mark a series of bytes as reserved.
    BufferMap.StaticNumberField
    A NumberField where the value returned MUST equal the expectedValue specified.
    BufferMap.StaticStringField
    A StaticStringField where the value returned MUST equal the expectedValue specified or an IllegalValueInStaticFieldException will be thrown
    BufferMap.StringField
    This class is for fields that are interpreted as ASCII strings
  • Classes in com.thesonofthom.tools used by com.thesonofthom.tools 
    Class and Description
    Buffer
    This class is a wrapper around a binary buffer of data (byte array) that allows easy parsing and modification of data within the array
    Buffer.Endian
    indicates whether the data is big or endian
    Buffer.Signedness
    Indicates whether a value is signed or unsigned
    BufferMap
    This class is a powerful tool that can be used to easily parse a binary buffer of data (byte array) that contains static, known data.
    BufferMap.AbstractArrayField
    The abstract class for dealing with an array of the same data type.
    BufferMap.AbstractField
    This is the base class for all Fields.
    BufferMap.ArraySizeType
    enum for ComplexArrayField to indicate whether the size specified in the constructor is the number of elements in the array or the total size of the array in bytes
    BufferMap.BitsField
    This class is for fields that are less than a single byte long.
    BufferMap.BufferField
    This class is for fields that contain a large amount of data that does not need to be parsed By default, the toString() output only prints the number of bytes in the buffer.
    BufferMap.ComplexField
    This class is for specifying fields that themselves are complex structures that contain other fields
    BufferMap.IllegalValueInBufferFieldException
    Exception to indicate that, when building the list of AbstractField objects in the BufferMap, an error occurred because the structure defined is invalid in some way
    BufferMap.NumberArrayField
    Class for representing a field that is simply an array of numbers.
    BufferMap.NumberField
    This is used if the field is a simple integer value between 0 and 8 bytes long
    BufferMap.StringField
    This class is for fields that are interpreted as ASCII strings
    MethodCallGenerator.DeclaredObject
    Used to differentiate between strings that need quotes around them and objects
  • Classes in com.thesonofthom.tools used by com.thesonofthom.tools.examples 
    Class and Description
    BufferMap
    This class is a powerful tool that can be used to easily parse a binary buffer of data (byte array) that contains static, known data.
